thread.title: Sarah P.

author: Sarah P.
title: Sarah P.
text: This course was convenient, educational, and extremely user friendly. I liked how each module was easy to follow and right to the point. I was very impressed and happy to have taken this course online. When I wasn't able to attend the courses through the county area because of either conflicts or work, this was great to pick up where I left off and able to review sections again. Having sections with unlimited time and the testing takes away added pressure.
